sentence: Thus, the primary objective of our systematic review and meta-analysis was to map the de novo genotypes, sub genotypes, genotypes mixtures and recombinant genotypes then suggest a plausible explanation for the spatial distribution of these genotypes and sub genotypes basing on the historical and recent intracontinental and intercontinental migrations (Fig. 1).

Thus, the primary objective of our systematic review and meta-analysis was to map the de novo genotypes, sub genotypes, genotypes mixtures and recombinant genotypes then suggest a plausible explanation for the spatial distribution of these genotypes and sub genotypes basing on the historical and recent intracontinental and intercontinental migrations (Fig. 1).
